content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 16 Apr 2019Is there any benefits in using a Cash account over Pre-funded account? Do most people use Cash account or pre-funded?1 answerAnswerBump0

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Pre-funded, cheaper commissions but everytime you need to transfer money in before you execute a buy orderCash account, normal comissions but you can contra. Can buy without any cash, only need to pay cash by T+3. Means you can buy and buy then selll before T+3 to get profits.1 comment1
Billy Ko17 Apr 2019Some pre-funded accounts pays you interest for putting your money there too! That's an additional benefit
